issue.title: [Rust] String-based path field projection
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11619](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11619). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to ARROW-11618, we could benefit from the ability to pluck out specific fields from an Arrow schema.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11619?focusedCommentId=17332214) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
